title: Please remove Fizz's E
body:
Fizz's E is so cancerous, it has such a low cooldown and does so much damage. Its not fair how you can just do half someones health under tower then just E away untouched. 

You don't even have to use it for it to be useful. Lots of people don't use their important skills until fizz E's because if they do then fizz will kill them.

This skill is cancer to the game. Not sure why riot would give someone a low cooldown invincibility that does a lot of damage.

replies.body:
He can't use it to do damage then e away.

It is an escape **or** gapcloser/damage.

And his other skills got nerfed so...

I think it's fine.
I agree his E is one of the most problematic basic skills in the game but I don't think "Removing it" is the best solution at least make some sort of suggestion as to how to change it.

Play Veigar, wait for E, once E is used, stun field+full combo.

Fizz is now ~~Slaughtered~~ cured
You don't even have to wait, he still gets stunned if he tries to backflip over it anyways iirc.

16 seconds of CD isn't low? Especially since any Fizz players would max it last. You literally have 16 seconds of opportunity to kill him once it's down. If you can't make a play within that time, then maybe you're just bronze.

Lots of people max it first and lots build lucidity boots to put it even lower.

Don't call people bronze if you're silver 5 which is the same as bronze. I'm gold 4.
